name: Burmy
description: To shelter itself from cold, wintry winds, it covers itself with a cloak made of twigs and leaves.

abilities.name: Shed Skin
abilities.effect: After each turn, this Pokémon has a 33% of being cured of any major status ailment.

abilities.name: Overcoat
abilities.effect: This Pokémon does not take damage from weather.
abilities.description: Protects the Pokémon from damage from weather.
